title: The compleat history of the warrs of Flanders written in Italian by the learned and famous Cardinall Bentivoglio ; Englished by the Right Honorable Henry, Earl of Monmouth ; the whole work illustrated with many figures of the chief personages mentioned in this history.
author: Bentivoglio, Guido, 1577-1644.
notes: Translation of: Della guerra di Fiandra.
Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
